001package com.ericlam.mc.eldgui.component.factory;
002
003import com.ericlam.mc.eld.services.ItemStackService;
004import com.ericlam.mc.eldgui.component.AttributeController;
005import com.ericlam.mc.eldgui.component.Component;
006import com.ericlam.mc.eldgui.component.ComponentFactory;
007import org.bukkit.Material;
008
009import java.util.function.Consumer;
010
011/**
012 * 用於繼承組件工廠，預設了很多事先的邏輯，方便創建
013 * @param <Factory> 工廠
014 */
015public abstract class AbstractComponentFactory<Factory extends ComponentFactory<Factory>> implements ComponentFactory<Factory> {
016
017    private final ItemStackService itemStackService;
018    protected final AttributeController attributeController;
019    private ItemStackService.ItemFactory itemFactory;
020
021    private final Factory factory;
022
023    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
024    public AbstractComponentFactory(ItemStackService itemStackService, AttributeController attributeController) {
025        this.itemStackService = itemStackService;
026        this.attributeController = attributeController;
027        this.itemFactory = itemStackService.build(Material.STONE);
028        this.factory = (Factory) this;
029        this.defaultProperties();
030    }
031
032    protected final Factory editItemByFactory(Consumer<ItemStackService.ItemFactory> factoryConsumer){
033        factoryConsumer.accept(this.itemFactory);
034        return factory;
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public Factory icon(Material material) {
039        this.itemFactory.material(material);
040        return factory;
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public Factory bind(String key, Object value) {
045        attributeController.setAttribute(this.itemFactory.getItem(), key, value);
046        return factory;
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public Factory number(int amount) {
051        this.itemFactory.amount(amount);
052        return factory;
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public final Component create() {
057        Component component = build(this.itemFactory);
058        this.itemFactory = itemStackService.build(Material.STONE);
059        this.defaultProperties();
060        return component;
061    }
062
063    protected abstract void defaultProperties();
064
065    public abstract Component build(ItemStackService.ItemFactory itemFactory);
066
067}
